stimulusHtml:
Answer the following questions about the solubility of AgCl(s). The value of Ksp for AgCl(s) is 1.8 × 10−10.

  1. Calculate the value of [Ag+] in a saturated solution of AgCl in distilled water.

  2. The concentration of Cl−(aq) in seawater is 0.54 M.

    1. Calculate the molar solubility of AgCl(s) in seawater.

    2. Explain why AgCl(s) is less soluble in seawater than in distilled water.
